title: Event Catalog and Payload Schema
body_html:
Event Catalog and Payload Schema

Event Types (Examples)

  • issue.created, issue.updated, issue.deleted
  • issue.status_changed, issue.assigned, issue.priority_changed
  • project.created, project.updated, project.archived
  • comment.created, attachment.added

Headers

  • Content-Type: application/json
  • User-Agent: Huly-Webhook/1.0
  • X-Huly-Event: <eventType>
  • X-Huly-Delivery: <uuid>
  • X-Huly-Attempt: <n>
  • X-Huly-Signature-256: sha256=<hex> (if secret configured)

Payload Schema (Example)

{
  "event": {
    "id": "uuid",
    "type": "issue.created",
    "timestamp": "2025-07-17T20:45:00Z",
    "workspace": "workspace-name"
  },
  "data": {
    "object": { /* class-specific fields */ },
    "changes": { /* for updates */ },
    "actor": { "id": "user-id", "name": "User" }
  },
  "metadata": {
    "version": "1.0",
    "delivery_id": "uuid"
  }
}

Versioning

  • metadata.version increments when breaking payload changes occur
  • Consumers should validate X-Huly-Event and schema
